title: Greater Healing Potion
summaries: The Greater Healing Potion is a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Hardmode / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) pre-Hardmode potion that restores 150 health and inflicts Potion Sickness for 60 seconds when used. This duration can be reduced via the Philosopher's Stone or Charm of Myths.

Greater Healing Potions can be crafted or obtained from Hardmode bosses and Biome Mimics(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, they can be obtained from Golden Crates, but on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, they cannot be obtained outside of Hardmode.
